title: Black and white: a creative leisure film
brief_description: Children’s drawings in black and white. Finger and brush painting using poster colours and crayons. Shows the technique of applying paint with rollers over paper having a crayon drawing which remains distinct so as to obtain a reverse copy on dampened paper which looks like a negative print.
